Name: VEPCON: Source imaging of high-density visual evoked potentials with multi-scale brain parcellations and connectomes
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the associated scientific data paper: Pascucci, D., Tourbier, S., Rué-Queralt, J. et al. Source imaging of high-density visual evoked potentials with multi-scale brain parcellations and connectomes. Sci Data 9, 9 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-021-01116-1
